direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods construct URLs with similar control flows and parameter handling, but with different types of inputs (ArrayList vs. Map).
Both methods join parameters into a URL string, but one handles streams and the other handles general query parameters.
Both methods join a list of strings into a single URL component, making test cases for one method highly applicable to the other.
Both methods handle URL encoding and manage exceptions similarly, making exception handling test cases transferable.
Both methods access system resources (e.g., time for timestamp, streams for URL building), suggesting similar resource management test cases.
